description: Deletes a given  Facet. All attributes and  Rules that are associated with the facet will be deleted. Only development schema facets are allowed deletion.

parameters.name: SchemaArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the  Facet. For more information, see  arns.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the facet to delete.
